statements: CREATE TABLE games (game_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, game_name STRING NOT NULL, release_date DATE NOT NULL, genre STRING NOT NULL, rating DOUBLE NOT NULL, platform STRING NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE players (player_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING NOT NULL, age INT NOT NULL, gender STRING NOT NULL, email STRING NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE scores (score_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, game_id UUID NOT NULL, player_id UUID NOT NULL, score INT NOT NULL, date_played DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, player_level INT);
CREATE TABLE games (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, game_genre VARCHAR(50);
CREATE TABLE Player ( player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, level INTEGER NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE Game ( game_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, release_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE Scoreboard ( player_id UUID REFERENCES Player(player_id), game_id UUID REFERENCES Game(game_id), score INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id) )
CREATE TABLE game (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, release_date DATE, platform VARCHAR(100);
CREATE TABLE player (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, registration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE developer (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, founded_date DATE, headquarters VARCHAR(255);
CREATE TABLE example_table1 (column1 DATATYPE, column2 DATATYPE, column3 DATATYPE, PRIMARY KEY(column1));
CREATE TABLE example_table2 (column1 DATATYPE, column2 DATATYPE, column3 DATATYPE, PRIMARY KEY(column1));
CREATE TABLE example_table3 (column1 DATATYPE, column2 DATATYPE, column3 DATATYPE, PRIMARY KEY(column1));
